template<class eltype, class mat_type, class ya_type2>
void point_pca (  const YA_BaseT &  input,
const ya_sizet  k,
const ya_type2 &  dims,
EigenOptions &  eigopts,
YA_RowD &  vmean,
YA_RowD &  vmin,
YA_RowD &  vmax,
YA_RowD &  vstd,
const int  verbose
) 
 

Return statistics of residual variances for n points from PCA.

Parameters:
input n x d matrix of samples
k Local PCA is performed on each point and its k nearest neighbors
dims length D vector containing dimensions for statistics calculation
vmean length D vector containing mean residual variance for each dim
vmin length D vector containing min residual variance for each dim
vmax length D vector containing max residual variance for each dim
vstd length D vector containing std devation of residual variance
verbose 0 no output, 1 progress meter/timing, 2 also nbor stats *

template<class eltype, class mat_type>

YA_RowD &  vmax,
YA_RowD &  vstd,
const int  verbose
) 
 

Return statistics of residual variances for n points from PCA.

Parameters:
input n x d matrix of samples
k Local PCA is performed on each point and its k nearest neighbors
vmean length d vector containing mean residual variance for each dim
vmin length d vector containing min residual variance for each dim
vmax length d vector containing max residual variance for each dim
vstd length d vector containing std devation of residual variance
verbose 0 no output, 1 progress meter/timing, 2 also nbor stats *

Return a n x d matrix of residual variances for n points from PCA.

Parameters:
dims length D vector of dimensionalities to include in calculation
input n x D matrix of samples
k Local PCA is performed on each point and its k nearest neighbors
output n x D matrix of residual variances
verbose 0 no output, 1 progress meter/timing, 2 also nbor stats *
